title: Anna Heinrich says her husband Tim Robards 'kisses a lot of girls' on Neighbours
text:
She recently showed off her sensual side on The Real Dirty Dancing.

And Anna Heinrich has revealed what her husband Tim Robards thinks about her getting hot and heavy with co-star Hugh Sheridan.

Speaking on The Morning Show on Wednesday, the 32-year-old said: 'He was pretty proud of me because I don't think he thought I could have done it.'

'That's nothing compared to what he does!' Anna Heinrich has revealed what her husband Tim Robards thinks about her getting hot and heavy with Hugh Sheridan on The Real Dirty Dancing

'So he was really proud that I put myself out there,' she added.

When asked if there was any jealousy on Tim's part, Anna said: 'He's acting now, so I'm sure he kisses a lot of girls on set!

'So for me to grind up on Hugh is fine. That's nothing compared to what he does.'

No worries! Anna (pictured with Hugh Sheridan) told The Morning Show on Wednesday, 'I'm sure [Tim] kisses a lot of girls on set, so for me to grind up on Hugh is fine'

On-screen couple: Tim made his acting debut as hotelier Pierce Greyson on Neighbours last year, starring opposite April Rose Pengilly (pictured) as Chloe Brennan

Tim made his acting debut as hotelier Pierce Greyson on Neighbours last year, starring opposite April Rose Pengilly as Chloe Brennan.

During his initial six-week stint on the Channel Seven soap, fans watched his character get cosy with Chloe.

Tim returned to Ramsay Street in May as a permanent cast member. He is now based in Melbourne and flies back to Sydney, where Anna lives, on weekends.

Long-distance marriage: Tim is now based in Melbourne and flies back to Sydney, where Anna lives, on weekends. They often take advantage of production breaks by travelling overseas

Anna explained they make the most of their time together during production breaks by travelling overseas.

The couple recently enjoyed a romantic getaway in Paris, before jetting off to Spain and Morocco.

'I had never been to Morocco before and it was incredible,' she said.
